text: Burrill B. Crohn (June 13, 1884 â€“ July 29, 1983) was an American gastroenterologist. He was one of the first to describe Crohn's disease. He was born in New York. Crohn died in Connecticut at the age of 99. Category:1884 births Category:1983 deaths Category:American physicians Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:Crohn's disease
title: Burrill Bernard Crohn
